thread.title: Tianqi Lithium to Buy Minority Stake in Miner SQM for $4.07 Billion

author: Allison Prang
title: Tianqi Lithium to Buy Minority Stake in Miner SQM for $4.07 Billion

organizations.name: sociedad quimica y minera de chile sa

text:
Tianqi Lithium Corp. is buying a stake in a Chile-based lithium production and distribution company from Nutrien Ltd. for about $4.07 billion, further growing Chinaâ€™s hold over the market for lithium.
Tianqi has agreed to buy about 62.6 million class A shares in Sociedad Quimica y Minera de Chile SA, also called SQM, for about $65 a share in cash.
